So shall it be. Rudra, Rauq and I are going to revise the process of 
character creation and make it more than simple description, at least 
for the sake of giving every char strengths and weaknesses.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., nbwrpg@y... wrote:
> 
> The following nbwrpg poll is now closed.  Here are the 
> final results: 
> 
> 
> POLL QUESTION: Should character creation process be 
> revised to offer a better idea of the 
> capabilities of the character? 
> 
> CHOICES AND RESULTS
> - No, it is good as it is., 0 votes, 0.00%  
> - Yes, but there should be only slight guidances to it., 2 votes, 
50.00%  
> - Yes, it should be more complete., 2 votes, 50.00%  
> - I don't give a damn., 0 votes, 0.00%  
> 
> INDIVIDUAL VOTES
> - No, it is good as it is. 
> - Yes, but there should be only slight guidances to it. 
>      - airly2002@h... 
>      - x_rauq_x@y... 
> - Yes, it should be more complete. 
>      - KaiserTeufel@h... 
>      - lordofdarkness11001@y... 
> - I don't give a damn. 
>
